CustomField.formula:
If ( OR(AND( Rep_Team__c<>'',CONTAINS( LOWER($User.Teams__c) , (LOWER(Rep_Team__c) &";"))), AND( Rep_Team__c<>'',CONTAINS( LOWER($User.Teams2__c) , (LOWER(Rep_Team__c) &";"))), AND( Rep_Team__c<>'',CONTAINS( LOWER($User.Teams3__c) , (LOWER(Rep_Team__c) &";"))) )
,True,False)
CustomField.label: Teams Multiselect Access
